credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Project for a reliquary
provenance: From the Collection of Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr and Mrs Edward D. Brandegee
medium: Brush and blue wash, pen and brown ink, black chalk
description: An angel, standing on a base, carries in his raised hands a capital, upon which an escutcheon stands.  It is crowned by a cross and surrounded by flower sprays as shown in the left side.
name: Drawing
